title: My take on a carrot cake
ingredients: ['1 orange, zested and juiced', '100g raisins', '145g light or dark brown soft sugar', '145ml sunflower oil', '3 medium eggs', '375g carrots, grated', '30g walnuts, crushed', '30g ground almonds', '140g wholemeal flour', '145g self-raising flour', '1 1/4 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 1/4 teaspoons baking powder', '2 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon or mixed spice', 'For the topping (optional)', '3 tablespoons icing sugar', '100g low fat soft cheese', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', 'zest of 1 orange']
